headline: Senior Software Engineer | Msc student in Technology Entrepreneurship | Skydiver
summary: Full-stack developer with a startup-driven mindset and the technical depth to thrive in top-tier engineering teams. I specialize in the TypeScript ecosystem, building high-performance, user-centric applications with clean architecture and rapid iteration. Having worked in fast-moving, highly regulated domains like KYC, compliance, and risk management, I understand the balance between speed, security, and auditability. In startups, requirements shift, constraints evolve, and execution speed matters. I take a pragmatic, LEAN approach to software‚Äîdelivering value early, iterating fast, and adapting to real-world feedback. At Avallone, I‚Äôve tackled compliance automation, risk assessment, and regulatory workflows, ensuring businesses can operate confidently in complex environments. I thrive in high-caliber engineering teams that embrace adaptability, customer obsession, and a bias for action. I love solving hard problems, engineering for trust and compliance, and building software that truly moves the needle.

education_degrees: Bachelor in Computer Science, Computer Software Engineering

education.description: A cutting-edge program at the intersection of technology and business innovation, the MSc in Technology Entrepreneurship at DTU empowers future founders and leaders to build impactful startups from the ground up. Combining advanced technical insights with strategic business acumen, the program fosters a hands-on, real-world approach to launching and scaling ventures. With direct access to top-tier investors, entrepreneurs, and industry experts, the program provides the tools and network necessary to drive transformative change in tech-driven industries and bring breakthrough innovations to market. Show less
education.institution_full_address: Anker Engelunds Vej 1; Building 101A; Kgs. Lyngby, Capital Region of Denmark 2800, DK

education.degree: Bachelor in Computer Science, Computer Software Engineering
education.description: I have completed a comprehensive program focused on software development, algorithms, data structures, and systems architecture. The degree provided a strong balance of theoretical knowledge and practical application, enabling me to design, build, and optimize high-performance systems. Throughout the program, I gained hands-on experience with modern programming languages, databases, and development methodologies, equipping me to solve complex technical challenges and drive innovation. With a focus on real-world projects and industry collaboration, this degree sharpened my technical expertise and problem-solving skills, preparing me to thrive in today's dynamic tech landscape. Show less

My curiosity of life made me a member of CCI Greenheart cultural exchange program in the United States. During the program I was a student of a senior class at C. E. Byrd High School. Through the whole exchange program I've lived with an American family for 10 months in Shreveport, LA.

recommendations.recommendation:
‚ÄúLuke has a zest and energy for learning and living well.

When we started working together, he was the only developer in a small R&D team. And of course, he brought his frontend skills to the game. But when the team needed some backend work done and integration into other systems, we didn't need to go looking for someone else. Luke simply started learning what he needed to know. When he is needed, he knows how to jump and to jump quickly!

Maybe he learned this from all his skydiving? Or perhaps all the times he has had jump into freezing water for icy winter swims? Whatever the reason, Luke is not afraid to get involved.

Because of his exposure to working with customers and clients, he is also proficient at understanding the user point-of-view. He asks interesting and thought-provoking questions which have helped the team to uncover more elegant user and technical solutions.

This man is a champion.‚Äù
